channel.title: Getting server online
channel.description: Ok, I have up loaded my RSPS to www.uppit.com(http://uppit.com/v/RMY1CXBN) And i tried to go register it, but i forgot to put the link to get on it since it does have a client, What do i need to do? Please help, Im still kinda new at this

item.title: Getting server online
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

just download the server and client and in both folders
click run.bat

if you want to host it online so other people can join
theres a few tutorials out.

Read full topic
